item.title: baseball roundup: lee allows 3 hits as phillies shut out the nationals

item.title: japan plans 3 trillion yen extra budget, no debt issue: media
item.description: japan will not issue new debt to fund an initial extra budget of more than $35 billion for disaster relief, the asahi newspaper said, in a sign the government is wary of alarming bond investors by adding too much to japan's already huge debt pile.

item.title: obit: baruch blumberg, nobel winner and extraterrestrial researcher
item.description: baruch blumberg, who won the 1976 nobel prize in medicine for his work identifying the hepatitis b virus and in the 1970s helped create a vaccine against the disease that is credited with saving millions of lives, died tuesday during a workshop at a nasa workshop in california. he shared the prize with d. carleton gajdusek for the duo's work on the origins and spread of infectious viral diseases.
